posts.title: Mommie Dearest
posts.excerpt: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

posts._title: Srdjan Vuletic – Ljeto u zlatnoj dolini AKA Summer in the Golden Valley (2003)
posts.title: Ljeto u zlatnoj dolini
posts.excerpt: Quote:In a postwar Sarajevo, a young boy is trying to repay debt of his deceased father in a special Bosnian way.

posts._title: Mitsuo Yanagimachi – Tabisuru pao-jiang-hu AKA Wandering Peddlers [+Extra] (1995)
posts.title: Tabisuru pao-jiang-hu
posts.excerpt: A wonderful, captivating, and far-too-seldom-seen film by the brilliant Mitsuo Yanagimachi. As photographed by the equally brilliant Masaki Tamura (Ogawa Productions, Lady Snowblood, Tampopo, P.P. Rider).

posts._title: Kazuo Hara – Mata no hi no chika AKA The Many Faces of Chika (2005)
posts.title: Mata no hi no chika
posts.excerpt: Director Kazuo Hara tells the tale of the eponymous Chika and four different relationships she has during the turbulent political climate of the 1970s. Four different actresses play the role of Chika in order to emphasise the different ways she is perceived by her husband, a teacher, a student and an aging gangster.

posts.title: Io sto bene
posts.excerpt: Antonio has spent his whole life away from Italy, his home country. He crosses paths with Leo, a young Italian artist who is trying to make it abroad. The old man and the young woman’s destinies mirror each other. Memories from the past are awoken and end up offering a more peaceful future to the …

posts.title: Midnight
posts.excerpt: Frank S. Nugent wrote:‘Midnight,’ With Don Ameche and Claudette Colbert, Strikes a Seasonal High in Comedy at the Paramount The ice went out of the river at the Paramount yesterday, and Spring came laughing in with “Midnight,” one of the liveliest, gayest, wittiest and naughtiest comedies of a long hard season. Its direction, by Mitchell …

posts._title: Juan López Moctezuma – Mary, Mary, Bloody Mary (1975)
posts.title: Mary, Mary, Bloody Mary
posts.excerpt: A beautiful artist moonlights as a vampire while in Mexico, killing lovers of both sex. It seems that the only person who has any chance of stopping her reign of terror is her father; who’s also a vampire.

posts.title: Villain
posts.excerpt: Quote:“Murderous, sadistic London gang leader Vic Dakin, a mother-obsessed homosexual modeled on real-life gangster Ronnie Kray, is worried about potential stool pigeons that may bring down his criminal empire. The brutal Vic cuts the throat of one bloke who has been a little too loose-lipped, afraid that his gossiping may turn into a grand operatic …

posts._title: Yimou Zhang – Man cheng jin dai huang jin jia AKA Curse of the Golden Flower [+Extras] (2006)
posts.title: Man cheng jin dai huang jin jia
posts.excerpt: A dying love between two powerful people leads to deceit, infidelity, and conspiracy in this epic-scale historical drama from director Zhang Yimou. During the latter days of the Tang dynasty, the Emperor (Chow Yun-Fat) returns home from the war with his son Prince Jai (Jay Chou) in tow. However, the monarch gets a chilly reception …

posts._title: Kamila Andini – Sekala Niskala AKA The Seen and Unseen (2017)
posts.title: Sekala Niskala
posts.excerpt: A young girl seeks out imaginative ways to cope with the death of her twin brother.
